content:
Based on the information provided, here are some clarifying questions you can ask:

1. Can you provide more details about the incident where you were touched without verbal consent?
2. Did the doctor or anyone else in the hospital explain to you why they touched you without verbal consent, despite being informed of your PTSD?
3. Can you explain the specific actions you have taken in your complaint to the hospital and discussion with the director?
4. Were you provided with any documentation or reports related to the incident or your complaint?
5. Have you spoken with any other medical professionals or legal experts about this incident?
6. Do you have any specific questions or concerns you would like addressed in regards to this situation?
